page.title: 09***** FIRE ! *****
page.content: Fires are common here and cause a lot of damage. It takes from 6 to 12 months for a council house to be repaired. During this time the family is usually rehoused. In the past year there have been 36 fires in{Ruchazie, 54 in{Garthamlock}and 25 in{Craigend. The fire brigade have 5-8 minutes to attend an incident, but the Easterhouse brigade usually takes much less time than this. Apart from cuts and grazes there were no serious injuries to firemen. The main causes of the fires were most commonly,{chip/grill pan fires, followed by electrical faults, then careless disposal of smoking materials, children playing with matches or lighted papers, and wilful fire raising or vandalism. There were 35 false alarms last year.
